Articles.Content:
...

Could you maybe trim down your sig a little ?
Why are these not in the game already?

Why are these not in the game already?

Give it time, Nova is doing FX work this release, in future releases they\'ll probably let him add parts/ideas from his mods to the game. That\'s a lot of the reason he was picked up on the team, I\'m sure.

Space shuttle vangaurd, isnt that the name of a spaceport?

Vanguard was the Air Force\'s rocket program. ???
Fairings don\'t seem to be ejecting the way I thought they would. Is this an issue with the Alpha version of Silisko 2, or did I do something wrong?
So, Nova, as the EVAs are coming, with all that laderry-ladder stuff, will you convert the original\'s BACE Co. command pod to meet the new standards? (Inside, working ladder)
Did you add the fairing decouplers before the fairing panels?
If you\'re talking to me, I put the decoupler and then the fairings. When I engage the stage, it just decouples the stage, while the fairings stay as one whole piece.
You need to eject the fairings, then the stage decoupler, in different stages.
Tried that too. Put the fairings in a stage before the decoupler. Unless there is a piece I\'m missing(like the ejector in the advanced deocupler mod).
How do i unfurl the Solar Panels?

How do i unfurl the Solar Panels?

You press g.
Thank you Mr Me.
Has anyone made it to Minmus with the Edition 2 Alpha parts? Been try with no success. Plus I am a horrible pilot lol

Has anyone made it to Minmus with the Edition 2 Alpha parts? Been try with no success. Plus I am a horrible pilot lol

Try MechJeb.

Try MechJeb.

I have that too. I finally made it after I posted lol

I am bad at this stuff, so I\'m wondering were you place the CS files for the plugin...

(From the source files for BACE)

I am bad at this stuff, so I\'m wondering were you place the CS files for the plugin...

Those are the source files, you don\'t need those. All you need are the part files and the .dll for the plugin.
I wonder, Will these all get updated to work with .16? or do they already work with it?

By any chance would there be a way to have a sort of \'magnetism\' applied to specific parts? Essentially, if this is possible, we could have docking with magnets! Right now instead of much later!

Here, I even made a simple, easy to understand diagram:

(And could we get the old BACE command pod modules back? Those were great for making Muner bases.)

By any chance would there be a way to have a sort of \'magnetism\' applied to specific parts? Essentially, if this is possible, we could have docking with magnets! Right now instead of much later!

Here, I even made a simple, easy to understand diagram:

(And could we get the old BACE command pod modules back? Those were great for making Muner bases.)

Your diagram....did not live.

BTW, is this going to be updated for .16 so I can have more modules that my kerbals can clamber around on?

BTW, is this going to be updated for .16 so I can have more modules that my kerbals can clamber around on?

That would certainly be nice!

I can definetly see Silisko making some interesting new things for us to play with. Hes definetly the modder I trust to produce high quality mods, and to have quite a good hand at making parts that add more and more to the game. I remember the bits he was doing with cameras, I wonder if hes still working with that? That was awesome, and if he can get it to work still, it would be VERY cool to see something like a space telescope that we could actually see out of (though currently space is rather empty.)
Magnets should be possible since there\'s also part gravity.
Magnet launching grapple!
do the probodyne and BACE core parts (like the probe cores and the BACE buildings) still need kerbals in them at launch? and does the habitat BACE part let kerbals get inside it?
